mapper.delete: delete from app_user_task where status!=#{status} and userId in(select id from app_users where greenhorn=0)
mapper.select: select aut.id,DATE_FORMAT(aut.createTime, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime,aut.imgUrl, aut.amount dAmount,t.built, t.username,t.opusId,t.type,t.tiktokUserId from app_user_task aut left join tiktok_task t on t.id = aut.taskId where aut.userId = #{userId} and aut.status = #{status} order by t.createTime desc
select count(*) from app_user_task where userId = #{userId} and level >= #{level} and createTime between DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
select aut.id, vipOrderIds, aut.userId, amount, tt.type from app_user_task aut left join tiktok_task tt on aut.taskId = tt.id where aut.status = #{status} and aut.createTime <= #{localDateTime}
select aut.id, vipOrderIds, aut.userId, amount, tt.type from app_user_task aut left join tiktok_task tt on aut.taskId = tt.id where aut.id = #{id}
select imgUrl, built, aut.userId, status from app_user_task aut left join tiktok_task tt on aut.taskId = tt.id where aut.id = #{id}
select taskId,count(a.id) count from app_user_task a left join app_users u on a.userId=u.id where greenhorn=0 and status!=#{status} group by taskId
